original_text: but he impaled the chief baker, just as Joseph had said to them in his interpretation.
korean_text: 떡 굽는 관원장은 매달리니 요셉이 그들에게 해석함과 같이 되었으나

sentences.original_text: but he impaled the chief baker
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 수석 빵굽는 자를 꿰뚫었다

sentences.original_text: just as Joseph had said to them
